data.name: The Alchemist's Shadow - Halcyon Pike Demo
data.detailed_description: When he goes for help from the local police Uri finds himself locked in the asylum. Even after breaking lose from his cell he is unable to leave the building because an infestation of mutated insects block the exits. He must grab a weapon and fight thru the undead and infestation inside the hospital in order to make it back to the lighthouse to restock on supplies and craft life saving components.
data.about_the_game: When he goes for help from the local police Uri finds himself locked in the asylum. data.short_description: A horror plagues this aging town. Survive and use ingredients to craft gear in this dark themed blend between souls and survivor horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Storage: 32 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 32 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 32 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Dangerous Situations, Blood and Gore
